medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Mr. ___ presented to the ED with a multiple day history of epigastric pain, which began one week prior to his initial visit. He had worsening abdominal pain after being discharged home and after a clear liquid diet was initiated. His lipase level was significantly elevated at 1400 upon visiting his PCP before returning to the ED with a lipase of 990. There were no episodes of jaundice, nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, fevers, or chills reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hyperlipidemia; Bile duct brushings concerning for adenocarcinoma, likely cholangiocarcinoma.
